channel.title: The GevaldikGuy Show
channel.description: The Gevaldik Guy show of Torah, opinion and Jewish Music. Designed for the Frum driver who wants something to listen to on the way to or from work.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Torah, Opinion and Music
channel.itunes:author: Gevaldik Guy
channel.itunes:summary: The Gevaldik Guy show of Torah, opinion and Jewish Music. Designed for the Frum driver who wants something to listen to on the way to or from work.

item.title: Secular studies in the Yeshiva day school.
item.description: How can the secular studies in the Yeshiva day schools be im proved. Speaking Yeshivish.
item.dc:creator: Gevaldik Guy
item.itunes:summary: How can the secular studies in the Yeshiva day schools be im proved. Speaking Yeshivish.

item.title: Episode 3: Three Arguments why Haredim say they should not go to the army. Yeshivishe word of the day.
item.description: Carol says it's unfair her daughter has to go to the army and haredim do not. Gevaldikguy responds why haredim feel they shouldn't have to go to the army. Find out how eating Pita on Passover led to the Intifada. How Olmert and Satmar agree. How the Yiddish Theater protrayed Jews going to war according to Torah law. Yeshivish word of the day
item.dc:creator: Gevaldik Guy
item.itunes:summary: Carol says it's unfair her daughter has to go to the army and haredim do not. Gevaldikguy responds why haredim feel they shouldn't have to go to the army. Find out how eating Pita on Passover led to the Intifada. How Olmert and Satmar agree. How the Yiddish Theater protrayed Jews going to war according to Torah law. Yeshivish word of the day

item.title: Gevaldik Guy - Episode 2 - Purim Thoughts
item.description: How to celebrate Purim? Was Haman the ideal leader? Is Kadimah a good party for Hareidim?
item.dc:creator: Gevaldik Guy
item.itunes:summary: How to celebrate Purim? Was Haman the ideal leader? Is Kadimah a good party for Hareidim?

item.title: Episode 1: Why listen to the Gevaldikguy show?
item.description: Seems that on the way home in the car you have a choice to either listen to the radio, music or a shiur. This podcast introduces a fourth alternative. When you're too tired to listen to a shiur how about an inspirational discussion or a dvar torah or a good question on the Daf? Come listen and join the discussion. Thank You, Gevaldik Guy
